arts.ttl: Arsenal fans will be furious after hearing what the Premier League have announced ahead of Newcastle clash
Eddie Howe admits the Newcastle-Arsenal match has become very competitive
arts.sum: Arsenal secured a narrow 1-0 victory in their last competitive meeting with Newcastle United, ending a run of three consecutive defeats against the Magpies. The two sides met four times in competitive fixtures last season, with Newcastle emerging victorious in three of those encounters.
